verses.verse: Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' households of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> which is <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

All the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> at the <S%H2282>feast,<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H388>Ethanim,<s%> which is the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3391>month.<s%>
All the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

They brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> and all the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>Tent;<s%> even these the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> brought <S%H5927>up.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> to <S%H6440>him,<s%> were with him before the <S%H727>ark,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificing<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> that could not be <S%H5608>counted<s%> nor <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to its <S%H4725>place,<s%> into the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> to the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3671>place,<s%> even under the wings of the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%>

For the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and its <S%H905>poles<s%> <S%H4605>above.<s%>

The <S%H905>poles<s%> were so <S%H748>long<s%> that the <S%H7218>ends<s%> of the <S%H905>poles<s%> were seen <S%H7200>from<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle;<s%> but they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>outside:<s%> and there they are to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

There was nothing in the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7535>except<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3240>put<s%> there at <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> when <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
It came to <S%H3548>pass,<s%> when the priests had come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6051>place,<s%> that the cloud <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

so that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud;<s%> for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> that he would <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the thick <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>
I have <S%H1129>surely<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> you a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2073>habitation,<s%> a <S%H4349>place<s%> for you to dwell <S%H2073>in<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5437>about,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and has with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> <S%H559>it,<s%> saying,

<S%H3117><s%> 'Since the day that I brought my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> I <S%H977>chose<s%> no <S%H5892>city<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> might be <S%H977>there;<s%> but I chose <S%H1732>David<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

"Now it was in the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H3282><s%> 'Whereas it was in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> you did <S%H2895>well<s%> that it was in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

<S%H7535>Nevertheless,<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> but your <S%H1121>son<s%> who shall come forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of your <S%H2504>body,<s%> he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name.<s%>'

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6965>established<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> that he <S%H1696>spoke;<s%> for I have risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in the place of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and I <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>promised,<s%> and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

There I have <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark,<s%> in which is the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> when he brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the presence <S%H5048>of<s%> all the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> there is no <S%H430>God<s%> like <S%H8064>you,<s%> in heaven <S%H4605>above,<s%> or on <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8104>beneath;<s%> who keep <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> with your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you with all their <S%H3820>heart;<s%>

who have <S%H8104>kept<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which you <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H1696>him.<s%> Yes, you spoke with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and have <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> it with your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Now <S%H3068>therefore,<s%> may Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> with your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> that which you have <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H3772><s%> 'There shall not fail you a <S%H376>man<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7535>if<s%> only your <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me as you have <S%H1980>walked<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>'

"Now <S%H430>therefore,<s%> God of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> please let your <S%H1697>word<s%> be <S%H539>verified,<s%> which you <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father.<s%>

But will <S%H430>God<s%> in very <S%H552>deed<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on the <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H8064>Behold,<s%> heaven and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3557>can't<s%> contain <S%H637>you;<s%> how much less this <S%H1004>house<s%> that I have <S%H1129>built!<s%>

Yet have <S%H6437>respect<s%> for the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and for his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H7440>cry<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6419>prays<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day;<s%>

that your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> may be <S%H6605>open<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3117>day,<s%> even toward the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which you have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8034><s%> 'My name shall be <S%H8085>there;<s%>' to listen to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> which your <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to the <S%H8467>supplication<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H4725>place.<s%> <S%H8085>Yes,<s%> hear in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> and when you <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive.<s%>

"If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and an <S%H423>oath<s%> is <S%H5375>laid<s%> on him to cause him to <S%H422>swear,<s%> and he <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H423>swear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H4196>altar<s%> in this <S%H1004>house;<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7561>condemning<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> to <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6663>justifying<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> him according to his <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

"When your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are struck <S%H5062>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7725>you;<s%> if they turn again to <S%H3034>you,<s%> and confess your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> and make <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to you in this <S%H1004>house:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"When the <S%H8064>sky<s%> is shut <S%H6113>up,<s%> and there is no <S%H4306>rain,<s%> because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6419>you;<s%> if they pray toward this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H2403>sin,<s%> when you afflict <S%H6031>them:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when you <S%H3384>teach<s%> them the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> in which they should <S%H3212>walk;<s%> and <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> on your <S%H776>land,<s%> which you have <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

"If there is <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> if there is <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> if there is <S%H7711>blight,<s%> <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> or <S%H2625>caterpillar;<s%> if their <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H6887>besieges<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H8179>cities;<s%> whatever <S%H5061>plague,<s%> whatever sickness there <S%H4245>is;<s%>

whatever <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and <S%H8467>supplication<s%> is made by any <S%H120>man,<s%> or by all your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who shall <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5061>plague<s%> of his own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house:<s%>

then <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> and <S%H5545>forgive,<s%> and <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H5414>render<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> according to all his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> you <S%H3045>know;<s%> (for <S%H3045>you,<s%> even you only, know the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men;<s%>)
that they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> you all the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> which you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

"Moreover concerning the <S%H5237>foreigner,<s%> who is not of your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when he shall come <S%H935>out<s%> of a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H4616>for<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake

(for they shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> and of your <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and of your <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>); when he shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H6419>pray<s%> toward this <S%H1004>house;<s%>

<S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> your <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> <S%H4349>place,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> to you <S%H5971>for;<s%> that all the peoples of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H5971>you,<s%> as do your people <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"If your <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against their <S%H341>enemy,<s%> by <S%H1870>whatever<s%> way you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6419>them,<s%> and they pray to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> which you have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> and toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> for your <S%H8034>name;<s%>
then <S%H8085>hear<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer<s%> and their <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> and <S%H6213>maintain<s%> their <S%H4941>cause.<s%>

If they <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H120>you<s%> (for there is no man who <S%H2398>doesn't<s%> sin), and you are <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H5414>them,<s%> and deliver them to the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> so that they carry them <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7617>captive<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> off or <S%H7138>near;<s%>

yet if they shall <S%H7725>repent<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> where they are carried <S%H7617>captive,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H2603>again,<s%> and make supplication to you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of those who carried them <S%H7617>captive,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2398><s%> 'We have sinned, and have done <S%H5753>perversely;<s%> we have dealt <S%H7561>wickedly;<s%>'

<S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4496>rest<s%> to his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according to all that he <S%H1696>promised.<s%> There has not <S%H5307>failed<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> of all his <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>promise,<s%> which he <S%H1697>promised<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
